channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MA

item.title: Report X-2023080173
item.description:
Report X-2023080173

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-18T21:11:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-19
  • City: CHICOPEE
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: package handler notices box wet. placed item in spill bucket. spill contained in bucket. DescribePack: cap/ plug loose on top DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: package placed in spill bucket immediately. brought to QA for processing

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package found leaking. Placed into spill bucket and brought back to QA cage for further processing. DescribePack: Lid loosened causing material to leak DurationRel: 2 and MitigateEffect: Placed into spill bucket to minimize movement and spillage elsewhere.

item.title: Report X-2023070469
item.description:
Report X-2023070469

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-18T21:11:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-20
  • City: CHELMSFORD
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDED TO A PADDED ENVELOPE DUE TO THE RATTLE SOUND OF AEROSOL CANS. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED 4 X 5 OUNCE AEROSOL CANS OF K2R SPOTLIFTER. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER PACKAGING. THIS PACKAGE HAS NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.

item.title: Report X-2023061437
item.description:
Report X-2023061437

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-22
  • City: WATERTOWN

  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident

  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
